item.description:
Salt River

Salt River, “folk singers in the purest sense” (Face Magazine), consists of Lee Hosack, Mike and Bev Rogers and Cathy King.  Their folk/blues style is accented by their vocals and Mike’s signature harmonica.  Much of the group’s material is original but heavily influenced by the acoustic folk music of 1960s. The group’s close friendships and love of music are reflected in their performances and on their CD’s.

 

General info:

The Portsmouth Historical Society along with Carpe Diem’s George Hosker-Bouley present Discover Thursdays at the Discover Portsmouth Center. The series presents performing artists in a museum setting featuring the visual artists.

Performance begins at 7PM

Tickets are $12 at the door.

Discover Portsmouth is located at 10 Middle St. Portsmouth, NH (603) 436-8433 or visit us at PortsmouthHistory.org
item.how_to_find_us: This is an open event For Your Information. But please sign up and maybe we'll make it a meetup.
